verses.name: Acts 19:9
verses.text: But when divers were hardened, and believed not, but spake evil of that way before the multitude, he departed from them, and separated the disciples, disputing daily in the school of one Tyrannus.

verses.name: Acts 19:10
verses.text: And this continued by the space of two years; so that all they which dwelt in Asia heard the word of the Lord Jesus, both Jews and Greeks.

verses.name: Acts 19:11
verses.text: And God wrought special miracles by the hands of Paul:

verses.name: Acts 19:12
verses.text: So that from his body were brought unto the sick handkerchiefs or aprons, and the diseases departed from them, and the evil spirits went out of them.
